author: Alana Mastrangelo, Alana Mastrangelo
title: Coronavirus: Italy's Death Toll Exceeds 13,000
description: In the last 24 hours, 727 people have died in Italy from the Chinese coronavirus, bringing the nation's overall death toll to 13,155.
content: In the last 24 hours, 727 people have died in Italy from the Chinese coronavirus, bringing the nation’s overall death toll to 13,155 as of Wednesday — an increase of 5.8 percent in one day. The percentage, however, has been on a decline for the past few days,… [+1380 chars]
